text: Our Town is a 1940 American romantic drama movie directed by Sam Wood and was based on the 1938 play of the same name by Thornton Wilder. It stars William Holden, Martha Scott, Fay Bainter, Beulah Bondi, Thomas Mitchell, Guy Kibbee, Stuart Erwin, Frank Craven and was nominated for 6 Academy Awards in 1941.Harrison, Gilbert A. (1983). The Enthusiast: A Life of Thornton Wilder. New Haven and New York: Ticknor & Fields. p. 203. ISBN 0-89919-197-5. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Sam Wood
title: Our Town (movie)
